TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IScrollInfo

summary.span: 表示 控制項內部的主要可捲動區域。

span.span: Represents the main scrollable region inside a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會公開權限可讓邏輯捲動的比較子內容，以及運算的子項目可見的方法。The interface exposes access to methods that enable logical scrolling of child content as well as computing which child elements are visible. 此外，它會定義用來定義可捲動區域的屬性。In addition, it defines properties used to define the scrollable region. 邏輯捲動時，可以向下捲動到下一個項目，邏輯樹狀結構中。Logical scrolling enables scrolling to the next element in the logical tree. 實體捲動，相較之下，將內容捲動所定義的可測量遞增，以指定的方向。Physical scrolling, in contrast, scrolls content by a defined measurable increment in a specified direction. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝主機中的項目設定的值和其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set the value of its property to `false`.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.

span.span: if scrolling is possible; otherwise, .
This property has no default value.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Rect MakeVisible (System.Windows.Media.Visual visual, System.Windows.Rect rectangle);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Rect MakeVisible(class System.Windows.Media.Visual visual, valuetype System.Windows.Rect rectangle) cil managed
abstract member MakeVisible : System.Windows.Media.Visual * System.Windows.Rect -> System.Windows.Rect

span.span: A that becomes visible.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 識別要顯示之座標空間的週框。

span.span: A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.

summary.span: 強迫捲動內容，直到看到 物件的座標空間為止。

span.span: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a object is visible.
A that is visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分情況下，傳回的矩形會是輸入矩形的轉換的版本。In most cases, the returned rectangle is a transformed version of the input rectangle. 在某些情況下，例如當輸入的矩形不能完全符合檢視區中，傳回的值可能較小。In some cases, such as when the input rectangle cannot fit entirely within the viewport, the return value may be smaller.

summary.span: 取得或設定可控制捲動行為的 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a element that controls scrolling behavior.

value.span: 可控制捲動行為的 項目。

span.span: A element that controls scrolling behavior.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別實作必須呼叫屬性變更時，此物件上。Classes that implement must call on this object when properties change. 邏輯捲動時，可以向下捲動到下一個項目，邏輯樹狀結構中。Logical scrolling enables scrolling to the next element in the logical tree. 實體捲動，相較之下，將內容捲動所定義的可測量遞增，以指定的方向。Physical scrolling, in contrast, scrolls content by a defined measurable increment in a specified direction. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝主機中的項目設定的值和其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set the value of its property to `false`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用程序性程式碼的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property by using procedural code. [!code-csharp[IScrollInfoMethods#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/IScrollInfoMethods/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IScrollInfoMethods#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/IScrollInfoMethods/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]

span.span: Sets the amount of horizontal offset.
